document_data.name: Shattered Tower
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shattered Tower''' was the tower of the [[Archmage]] of [[Maerimydra]]. It was so named for it broken glass-like design.
document_data.Location: Located in a north-eastern side cavern of [[Maerimydra]], the Shattered Tower as somewhat separate from the rest of the city.
document_data.Structure:
The Shattered Tower was an oval-shaped building, constructed with walls seemingly made of cracked glass, though this was a purely decorative trait.

After the tower's destruction in [[1372 DR]], the Shattered Tower was nothing more than a pile of rubble that crackled with strange magical energy.
document_data.Defenses: The tower was defended by a cadre of elite [[drow]] guards, known as the [[Shattered Tower Guard]], who were skilled in both martial and magical arts. They wore polished black [[breastplate]], adorned with the symbol of the Shattered Tower. In addition, each guard carried a magical [[halberd]] that could ''[[spell storing|store spells]]''.
document_data.History: On [[Marpenoth 2]], [[1372 DR]], the Shattered Tower was assaulted by [[Irae T'sarran]]. [[Duneth Wharreil]], the Archmage of Maerimydra, was destroyed and transformed into a [[silveraith]]. By the end of the day's conflict, the Shattered Tower had been reduced to rubble.
